WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

 would it be possible to use the file name format {name}.chirp.less.css instead of {name}.chirp.less or support both so that Visual Studio gives you some degree of CSS syntax highlighting? I know it'll highlight mixins etc as errors but wouldn't it be better to have some form of syntax highlighting instead of none?
WorkItem.Summary: change less file extension to less.css

Comments.Message:
Thanks for the suggestion! This is now handles in v 1.0.0.4.

See: http://www.weirdlover.com/2010/07/18/chirpy-attains-godlike-abilities-in-version-1-0-0-4/
